column2: "Indeed, you're absolutely right about that! You really opened up my eyes!"
"I want to keep talking to them a whole bunch, and get along like we did... No, even better than we did in the past!"
"After all, Kyo and Luco are my cherished best friends!"
"Hehe. You sure do wear your heart on your sleeve. You should have more confidence in your feelings about those friends."
"Yeah, I will! Thanks! I'll see you around--whoa whoa whoa whoa!"
"I didn't mean to eavesdrop."
"Everything okay?"
"Oh, not at all! I'm sorry for not noticing you!"

"So, can you keep that conversation a secret?
A-anyways, I'm gonna head out, farewell!"
"Stratos, it doesn't seem like anything was overheard."
"Oh, ah? Is that so? Thank goodness, we're all good! Anyways, I'll take my leave!"
"Thanks for waiting. Oh, I'd appreciate if you kept my conversation with Stratos to yourself."
"Lately, I've found I've been able to help out a lot of the younger generation. At first, I wondered if someone like me would even be fit to give them advice..."
"Then before I knew it, it kind of became my new role, so to speak."
"It's something I'm capable of. Someone you can tell anything to and they'll listen."
"It's kind of helped me realize what he meant by his final words. To look toward the future and confront myself."
"Ever since then, I've been sorting out my mind while learning more about the story of him and my sister."
"Without words, you won't be able to convey anything. You'll never understand your special someone. After all this time, I feel like I understand that now."
"In the place of him and my sister, I can do my part to help, however small, just by giving advice to the younger generation."
"That's my new role. Thinking like that, looking only towards the future, and moving forward in life."
